Html:
Wonderful basic tutorial. I really enjoyed going through it. It is not very basic in the sense that I had to face a couple of configuration issues which were not mentioned even in the document. Since I have been into .NET development for some time now so I could sort out those issues myself.

The only thing which I couldn't resolve (or perhaps I didn't bother to resolve) was a design issue in views/home/index.cshtml and views/store/browse.cshtml views. The list of albums is displaying below the 'Genre' menu bar instead of showing on its right.

But still, thanks for the tutorial.

Sumit Mehta

http://www.sumitmehta.net
